review: Although it's a great pain reliever for my son it has caused terrible stomach pains and a flare of asthma. They worst was anaphylaxis and a trip to the A&E. No more naproxen for us :(
Aleve (naproxen):Didn't help at all, it did give me terrible heart burn though.
Aleve (naproxen):It caused tummy aches for my 6 year old
Aleve (naproxen):This medication seems to help the pain, but causes upset stomach and ringing in ears.
